sanskrit_verse:
तां विवर्जयतस्तस्य रजसा समभिप्लुताम् ।
प्रज्ञा तेजो बलं चक्षुरायुश्चैव प्रवर्धते ॥ ४.४२॥
transliteration: tāṁ vivarjayatastasya rajasā samabhiplutām | prajñā tejo balaṁ cakṣur āyuś caiva pravardhate || 4.42||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who abstains from sexual union with a woman in her menstrual period, whose consciousness is overwhelmed by rajasic impulse, shall experience enhancement of wisdom, radiance, strength, vision, and lifespan.

Restoration logic operates through withdrawal from degrading influences
Consciousness alignment manifests through purification of sensory engagement

supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters involving personal discipline and constitutional dharma, the court must evaluate whether the respondent exercised discriminant awareness regarding rajasic contamination. The threshold for responsibility lies in recognition of energetic degradation patterns. Authority derives from sustained alignment with purificatory conduct, not punitive compliance.

Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals that disciplined avoidance directly causes elevation in prajñā and tejas. Proportional responsibility correlates with depth of sensory discrimination practiced. Reality enforces through natural consequence, not punitive imposition.
